title: URBANopt Capacitor
description: Schema for an URBANopt RNM Capacitor object

Code.description: Unique name/ID of the feature in the RNM analysis.

Node.description: Name/ID of the RNM analysis feature it is associated with.

Subest.description: Substation the capacitor is connected to.

Feeder.description: Feeder the capacitor is connected to.
